Enduring Understandings:
1. [OBJ:expsec_k468:Absolute zero] is the point at which all molecular movement stops. Absolute zero can be used as a reference point between degrees Kelvin, Celsius, and Fahrenheit.
2. To [OBJ:expsec_k470:convert] from Celsius to Kelvin, add 273.15. To convert from Kelvin to Celsius, subtract 273.15. To convert from Fahrenheit to Celsius, subtract 32 and multiply by 5/9. To convert from Celsius to Fahrenheit, multiply by 9/5 and add 32.
